data.name: PRO Car Wash
data.description:
Time to chill with PRO CAR WASH! 
Clean the cars with a pressure wash, complete tasks and relax.
Pro Car Wash is a car wash simulation game for virtual reality. Build your own car wash business. All cars will have its own unique challanges . Remove hard dirts, refill oil, and change battery. Earn Wash Coin and unlock new upgrades for your workshop. Complete satisfying challenges. 
Join a relaxing adventure, cleaning will make you feel great for sure.
Key Features! 
-Wash the cars with different challenges 
-Remove hard muds and dirts with different pressure washer nozzles and foam connon.
-Polish faded car surfaces
-Get your hand dirty! Remove garbage from cars. 
-Refill oil and change batteries. 
-Sell car scents or oil to your customers for more Wash Coin!
-Upgrade your business with a better workshop. 
What is in the next update?
-Military Car Pack 
-Vacuum Cleaner for the inside of the cars 
and much more!

changelog.change_log:
Release notes 

 

Recently Added: 

-Foam Cannon 

-Car Wax/Polishing 

-Inventory desk 

-Dirt Vision Glasses (Can be used with the “X” button) 

-Tips for better experience 

-Quick tutorials 

 

Changes: 

-Graphic Improvements 

	-High resolution textures 

	-High quality reflections 

	-Detailed car dirts 

	-New realistic water sprays 

	-More sharp game graphics 

-Less negative force while using pressure washer 

-Gameplay balance (game is more easy for relaxing) 

-Performance Improvements 

 

Fixes: 

-Economy is not stucking anymore. 

-Mud counter fixed. 

-Broken UV Maps fixed. 

-Collision problems fixed. 

-Flying pressure washer fixed
